item.title: CVE-2023-3488|2023-07-28T15:36:29.124Z -- silabs.com -- gecko%20bootloader
item.description: Uninitialized buffer in GBL parser in Silicon Labs GSDK v4.3.0 and earlier allows attacker to leak data from Secure stack via malformed GBL file.
